summary: Settings page with category CRUD functionality tested successfully. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI working correctly with proper navigation, table display, and modal interactions.

integration_issues.issue: Session timeout during extended testing causes redirects to login page

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/categories/all returns categories with project_count field
Backend: POST /api/categories creates new category successfully
Backend: DELETE /api/categories/{id} succeeds for unused categories
Backend: DELETE /api/categories/{id} blocked for in-use categories (returns 400)
Frontend: Settings page navigation via sidebar 'Settings' link
Frontend: Categories table loads showing name, description, status, project count, actions
Frontend: Add Category button opens dialog with proper form fields
Frontend: Edit Category pencil icon opens pre-filled form
Frontend: Delete button disabled/greyed for in-use categories (Website has 7 projects)
Frontend: Category table displays project counts correctly
Frontend: Dialog forms have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Frontend: Modal dialogs open, close and cancel properly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (23/23 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (core functionality working, minor session timeout issue)
